oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sunday Down South - 1954-04-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sunday Down South, sponsored by Lion Oil. Originally broadcast 1954-04-25, part 1. Tribute to Tommy Dorsey. Personnel include Buddy Hall (host, performer), David Cobb (announcer), Owen Bradley (conductor) and the Lion Orchestra (performer) including Beverly DeCroy (trombone) and Dutch Gordon (trombone), the Anita Kerr Singers (performers), and Dolores Watson (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Hall; Owen Bradley; Lion Orchestra; Anita Kerr Singers; Dolores Watson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Got The South In My Soul) (Buddy Hall) -- Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Opening statement (Buddy Hall) -- Marie (Buddy Hall, Anita Kerr Singers) -- David Cobb and Buddy Hall talk about Tommy Dorsey -- Be Careful, It's My Heart (Dolores Watson) -- Buddy Hall and Dolores Watson talk about Tommy Dorsey -- East Of The Sun (And West Of The Moon) (Anita Kerr Singers) -- David Cobb talks about the Lion Oil scholarship -- Buddy Hall introduces Owen Bradley and the Lion Orchestra -- Tommy Dorsey medley (Owen Bradley and the Lion Orchestra)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sunday down south (Radio program); Cobb, David (Announcer); Hall, Buddy (Singer); Bradley, Owen; Lion Orchestra (Musical group); Gordon, Dutch; LeCroy, Beverly; Anita Kerr Singers
